title: quarkus  stopped unexpectedly with no error message

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

Quarkus  stopped unexpectedly with no error messageã€‚
My project is very simple ,  consume from one kafka topic, and send message to another topic.
But the program would stopped within a few days of starting , with no error message .
This is the log 
![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/26716574/7320c0e7-95c9-4ff7-9d4e-69a9c16aa0d1)




### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Linux uat142 4.19.90-2107.6.0.0100.oe1.bclinux.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Dec 1 19:59:44 CST 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Output of `java -version`

Graalvm  17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

17

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn 3.8.8
